alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 03 at 12:57PM MST until January 05 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING AND FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s possible. * WHERE...Northwest Pinal County, especially in the Casa Grande and Arizona City area. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning and from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
